src_original: tadyathā mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja svapne sā janapadakalyāṇī strī //  4. āha/ nohīdaṃ bhagavan //  5. bhagavānāha/
tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ kiṃ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /  yaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇīṃ striyamabhiniviśet //
atyantatayā tu bhagavan svapne janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate /  nopalabhyate /
kutaḥ punaranayāsārdhaṃ paricaraṇā /  evaṃ vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt //
7. bhagavānāha/  evameva mahārāja balo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi ddaṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyabhiniviśet /
saṃrakto rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanobhirabhisaṃskaroti /

niruddhaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /  na dakṣiṇām /  na paścimām /  nottarām /  nordhvam /  tat karma kadācinmaraṇa kālasamaya upasthite tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāt caramavijñāne niruddhe manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
evam hi mahārāja caramavijñānaṃ nirudhyate /  aupapattyaṃśikaṃ prathamavijñānaṃ utpadyate /  yadi vā deve /  yadi vā mānuṣe /
yadi vā narakeṣu /  yadi vā tiryagyoniṣu /  tasya ca mahārāja prathamavijñānasya samanantaraniraddhasya tatsabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /
yatra vipākasya pratisaṃvedanā prajñāyate /  tatra mahārāja na kaściddharmaḥ asmāt lokātparalokaṃ saṅkrāmati /
